workflow_1753289314239.name: Need You Transform Admin Workflow
workflow_1753289314239.description: Custom workflow to: Elena, I need you to create a workflow to transform the admin dashboard into a luxury editorial design. This MUST delegate to Aria - do NOT create any design yourself. Aria should implement full-bleed hero images, Times New Roman typography, magazine-style layouts, and editorial image breaks. The current admin dashboard is generic and needs Arias luxury editorial expertise.
